attributes.action: Should Fred Goodwin be stripped of his Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Fred Goodwin was at the helm of Royal Bank of Scotland whilst it posted losses of £24,000,000,000 (£24 Billion) now being paid for by every tax payer in the country. Should this man carry on being rewarded which such a title as 'Sir' when instead of defending this country (as Knights did in history) he helped to economically cripple it with the repercussions predicted to affect every citizen for a generation .
